Home.title: DnA Solutions
Home.description: We are a team of AI and data experts from CMC Corporation who are passionate about helping businesses leverage the power of AI and data to achieve their goals.

hero.subtitle: From startups to multinational corporations, we deliver scalable, reliable, and cost-effective AI and data services to address your unique challenges.
hero.cardText: Transform your business with expert engineering, seamless migrations, and innovative digital AI solutions.

logoCloud.title: Trusted by Leading Companies
logoCloud.subtitle: More than 2.2 million companies worldwide already trust us

whyUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyUs.subtitle: We are a team of experts who are passionate about helping businesses grow.

aiFirst.title: AI-First
aiFirst.description: Build with modern AI capabilities from day one.

openIntegrable.title: Open & Integrable
openIntegrable.description: Fits into your stack and ships everywhere.

aiFeature.title: Intelligent Automation for Enterprise
aiFeature.subtitle: Transform your business operations with our suite of AI-powered products. From document intelligence to email automation and invoice processing, our solutions integrate seamlessly with your existing systems to deliver measurable ROI.

prismaAI.title: Prisma AI
prismaAI.description: Your intelligent knowledge assistant. Like NotebookLM, Prisma AI synthesizes information from multiple documents, providing instant answers and deep insights through natural conversations. Extract knowledge, generate summaries, and get citations across all your enterprise documents.
prismaAI.imageAlt: Prisma AI interface showing document Q&A and knowledge synthesis

smartEmail.title: Smart Email
smartEmail.description: Intelligent email classification system that automatically categorizes, prioritizes, and routes emails. Reduce inbox overload by up to 60% and ensure critical messages never get missed with AI-powered priority detection and smart routing workflows.
smartEmail.imageAlt: Smart Email dashboard with email classification and priority detection

smartInvoice.title: Smart Invoice
smartInvoice.description: Invoice Intelligence Suite for SAP. Automate invoice processing from extraction to approval with seamless SAP integration. Reduce processing time by 80% with advanced OCR, automatic validation, and intelligent approval workflows.
smartInvoice.imageAlt: Smart Invoice interface showing OCR extraction and SAP integration

dataServices.title: Enterprise Data Services
dataServices.subtitle: Build a solid data foundation with our comprehensive data services. From governance to integration, we help you unlock the full potential of your data assets.

governance.title: Data Governance
governance.content: Establish robust data governance frameworks with policies, standards, and controls. Ensure data quality, security, and compliance with metadata management, data lineage tracking, and privacy controls across your organization.

lakehouse.title: Data Lakehouse
lakehouse.content: Modern data architecture combining the flexibility of data lakes with the reliability of data warehouses. Unified storage layer with ACID transactions, schema enforcement, and cost optimization for all your analytics and AI workloads.

integration.title: Data Integration
integration.content: Seamless data integration connecting disparate systems with real-time data flows. ETL/ELT pipelines, real-time streaming, API integration, and data transformation to ensure data consistency across your enterprise.

blogSection.title: Tech Insights
blogSection.subtitle: Exploring cutting-edge technologies shaping tomorrow's digital landscape

1.title: Generative AI in SAP: Revolutionizing Enterprise Workflows
1.excerpt: Discover how generative AI is transforming SAP environments with intelligent document generation and automated assistance.
1.author: Dat Le

2.title: Real-time data pipelines connecting SAP to modern AI/ML platforms
2.excerpt: Learn how to build robust real-time data pipelines that seamlessly connect SAP systems to modern AI/ML platforms.
2.author: Alex Thompson

3.title: AI-powered business intelligence transforming static reporting
3.excerpt: Learn how AI is transforming business intelligence from static reporting to intelligent analytics.
3.author: Emily Watson

4.title: SAP data migration strategies for seamless cloud transition
4.excerpt: A practical guide to migrating SAP data to cloud platforms with best practices.
4.author: David Kim

5.title: Building modern data architectures for enterprise analytics
5.excerpt: A comprehensive guide to designing modern data architectures that enable advanced analytics.
5.author: Sarah Chen

Blog.title: Insights & Resources
Blog.description: Explore expert perspectives on SAP, AI, and data solutions. Our team shares practical insights, industry trends, and strategic guidance to help you navigate digital transformation and unlock the full potential of your enterprise systems.

hero.headlineHighlight: Shaping the New Era of AI
hero.subtitle: CMC Consulting AI specializes in delivering advanced AI and data services to companies and groups, empowering them with innovative tools to meet their operational needs.
hero.subtitle2: CMC Consulting AI is committed to delivering artificial intelligence and data-driven services to companies. Our goal is to support enterprises in realizing their objectives through innovative AI and data strategies.

teamParagraphs: We began developing CMC Consulting AI in 2024 and officially launched in 2025. Every AI model, data pipeline, and integration has been engineered from the ground up — free from technical debt or outdated legacy systems. We are purposefully designed to drive advancements in AI and data solutions for the next century.

We remain 100% founder and team-owned, profitable, and committed to maintaining a lean, agile team. In time, this page will evolve with more refinements, but our current priority is delivering exceptional AI and data tools for businesses and innovators.
missionParagraphs: At CMC Consulting AI, we help businesses unlock the true power of AI and data. Our mission is to transform complex data into clear, actionable intelligence that drives better decision-making, increases efficiency, and creates a real competitive advantage.

We are obsessed with delivering measurable results. By deeply understanding your business challenges, we design and implement tailored AI and data solutions that eliminate guesswork, reduce operational waste, and accelerate growth.
Your success is our success — which is why we've maintained a perfect customer retention rate since day one.

prismaAI.title: Prisma AI
prismaAI.description: Transform how your team accesses and synthesizes information. Like NotebookLM, Prisma AI helps you extract insights from multiple documents through natural conversations.

multiDocQA.description: Ask questions across multiple documents and get answers with source citations.

knowledgeSynthesis.title: Knowledge Synthesis
knowledgeSynthesis.description: Automatically synthesize information from various sources into coherent insights.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast
lightningFast.description: Get instant answers powered by advanced RAG and vector search technology.

enterpriseSecurity.title: Enterprise Security
enterpriseSecurity.description: Your data stays secure with enterprise-grade encryption and access controls.

smartEmail.title: Smart Email
smartEmail.description: Never miss important emails again. Our AI automatically classifies, prioritizes, and routes emails so your team can focus on what matters most.

smartClassification.title: Smart Classification
smartClassification.description: Automatically categorize emails by topic, urgency, and department.

priorityDetection.title: Priority Detection
priorityDetection.description: AI identifies critical emails and surfaces them instantly to the right people.

autoRouting.title: Auto-Routing
autoRouting.description: Route emails to the right team or department based on content and context.

analyticsDashboard.title: Analytics Dashboard
analyticsDashboard.description: Track email volumes, response times, and team performance metrics.

smartInvoice.title: Smart Invoice
smartInvoice.description: Reduce invoice processing time by 80%. Automate extraction, validation, and approval workflows with seamless SAP integration.

ocrExtraction.title: OCR Extraction
ocrExtraction.description: Extract data from invoices with 99%+ accuracy using advanced OCR technology.

sapIntegration.title: SAP Integration
sapIntegration.description: Native integration with SAP for seamless data flow and real-time updates.

smartValidation.title: Smart Validation
smartValidation.description: Automatically validate invoice data against purchase orders and contracts.

approvalWorkflows.title: Approval Workflows
approvalWorkflows.description: Intelligent routing and approval workflows that adapt to your business rules.
